pages.title: Bleak
pages.text: While Bleak Is Applied, You Are Resistant To Freezing Damage

pages.title: Applying Bleak
pages.text: Using An Unconcealed Bleak Parchment Will Apply The Bleak Effect. Depending On The Parchment Used, You Will Receive It For A Longer Period Of Time Than A Normal Parchment Would Allow, Or You Can Receive It's Effects In A Stronger Variant.
